5:30 PM

Arrived

5:35 PM

Dec 11, 2023

I. CITY MANAGER'S AGENDA
1. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the re-appointment and
appointment of the following person as members of the Commission on Immigrant Rights and
Citizenship; Re-appointment Karin Lin. Appointments: Shubhan Nagendra and Vanessa Ruget.
CMA 2023 #291
RESULT:
VOTE TO APPROVE AND PLACED CMA ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of a
grant, in the amount of $100,000.00, received from the Massachusetts Department of Elementary and
Secondary Education (DESE), Adult and Community Learning Services, to the Grant Fund Human
Service Programs Salary and Wages account ($43,478.00) and to the Grant Fund Human Service
Programs Other Ordinary Maintenance account ($56,522.00). This grant provides funding for 2 CNA
(Certified Nursing Assistant) training programs for second language learners. The programs are for
immigrant adults who are interested in becoming certified nursing assistants and home health aides
(CNA/HHA).
CMA 2023 #292
RESULT:
APPROPRIATION ADOPTED CMA PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of the
Friends of the Community Learning Center (CLC) grant, in the amount of $30,000.00, to the Grant
Fund Human Service Programs Salary and Wages account ($25,367.00), to the Grant Fund Human
Service Programs Other Ordinary Maintenance account ($3,633.00), and to the Grant Fund Human
Service Programs Travel and Training account ($1,000.00). These funds will be used to support the
coordination of the Bridge to College Program and the teaching of PT teachers.
CMA 2023 #293
RESULT:
APPROPRIATION ADOPTED CMA PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 2

Dec 11, 2023

4. Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of
$11,000.00, received from the 1111 Foundation, to the Grant Fund Human Service Programs Other
Ordinary Maintenance account ($11,000.00).
CMA 2023 #294
RESULT:
APPROPRIATION ADOPTED CMA PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

5. Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of I am
hereby requesting an appropriation of the Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program grant in the
amount of $788,279.00 funded by the Federal Department of Health and Human Services and
administered in Massachusetts by the Commonwealth’s Department of Community and
Development, to the Grant Fund Human Service Programs Salary and Wages account ($145,645.00),
to the Grant Fund Human Service Programs Other Ordinary Maintenance account ($639,634.00), and
to the Grant Fund Human Service Programs Travel and Training account ($3,000.00).
CMA 2023 #295
RESULT:
APPROPRIATION ADOPTED CMA PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

6. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to Awaiting Report Item
23-57, regarding rodent control measures.
CMA 2023 #296
RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

7. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the Cambridge Natural
Hazard Mitigation Plan Update.
CMA 2023 #297
RESULT:
MOTION TO ADOPT THE HAZARD MITIGATION PLAN AND PLACE CMA
ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 3

Dec 11, 2023

8. A communication transmitted from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to an update on the City of
the Cambridge and Harvard University memorandum of agreement regarding Payment-in-Lieu-ofTaxes (PILOT).

RESULT:
PLACED ON FILE [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui


PAGE 4

Dec 11, 2023

II. CALENDAR

ON THE TABLE
1. An application was received from Nina Quinlan, requesting permission for a curb cut at the
premises numbered 63 Sixth Street said petition has received approval from Inspectional
Services, Traffic, Parking and Transportation, Historical Commission and Public Works.
Response has been received from the neighborhood association.
CHARTER RIGHT EXERCISED BY COUNCILLOR NOLAN
IN COUNCIL OCTOBER 30, 2023
PLACED ON THE TABLE IN COUNCIL NOVEMBER 6, 2023
APP 2023 #55
RESULT:
NO ACTION TAKEN

Next: 12/18/2023 5:30 PM

UNFINISHED BUSINESS
2. ORDD-2023-8B : Ordinance 2023 #8B Amend Chapter 14.04 – Fair Housing
PASSED TO A SECOND READING IN COUNCIL OCTOBER 2, 2023.
FURTHER AMENDED IN COUNCIL NOVEMBER 6, 2023.
THIS ITEM WILL REMAIN ON UNFINISHED BUSINESS UNTIL THE STATE
LEGISLATURE APPROVES THE SPECIAL ACT THAT IS NEEDED BEFORE THIS
CAN BE ORDAINED
ORDD-2023-8B
RESULT:
NO ACTION TAKEN

Next: 12/18/2023 5:30 PM

3. An Ordinance 2023 #12 has been received from City Clerk, relative to BUEDO the Municipal
Code of the City of Cambridge be amended in Chapter 8.67.100 entitled “Emission Reduction
Requirements".
PASSED TO A SECOND READING IN COUNCIL DECEMBER 4, 2023.
ELIGIBLE TO BE ORDAINED ON OR AFTER DECEMBER 18, 2023.
ORD 2023 # 12
RESULT:
NO ACTION TAKEN

PAGE 5

Next: 12/18/2023 5:30 PM

Dec 11, 2023

III. APPLICATIONS AND PETITIONS
1. An application was received from Stuart Pitchel representing The Painted Burro, requesting
permission for two (2) projecting blade signs at the premises numbered 32 Church Street approval has
been received from Inspectional Services, Department of Public Works, Community Development
Department and abutter has been provided along with proof of mailing
APP 2023 #60
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

2. An application was received from Fereydoun Safizadeh, requesting permission for a curb cut at the
premises numbered 18 Channing Street; said petition has received approval from Inspectional
Services, Traffic, Parking and Transportation, Historical Commission and Public Works. No
response has been received from the neighborhood associations.
APP 2023 #61
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

Dec 11, 2023

PAGE 15

Dec 11, 2023

V. POLICY ORDER AND RESOLUTION LIST
1. That the City Manager is requested to work with the Cambridge Police Department to fundamentally
change how it responds to situations that could lead to violence and death. EXERCISED BY
COUNCILLOR ZONDERVAN IN COUNCIL DECEMBER 11, 2023
POR 2023 #215
Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
CHARTER RIGHT EXERCISED BY COUNCILLOR ZONDERVAN
Next: 12/18/2023 5:30 PM

2. Transferring Items from the 2022-2023 Legislative Session.
POR 2023 #216
Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

3. That the City Council authorize an extension through January 24, 2024 for the Charter Review
Committee to submit the final report to the City Council.
POR 2023 #217
Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern,
Councillor Nolan, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan,
Mayor Siddiqui

Dec 11, 2023
